results.name: Triangle read by rows, A127368 * A000012, 1<=k<=n.
comment: Triangle read by rows, A127368 * A000012, 1<=k<=n. Triangle A127368 records the reduced residue system mod n. The operator A000012 takes partial sums starting from the right in A127368 rows.
example: First few rows of the triangle =
xref: Cf. A127368, A023896 (left border), A053818 (row sums).
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Aug 27 2008
